oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bible Way COGIC: front and side view
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bible Way Church of Christ in God
Color photograph of church front and side view. The brick church features a gable front with a gable vent on the facade. A parking lot sits to the left of the building.
Located in Cleveland, Tennessee, Bible Way COGIC's church building dates back to 1960. According to fieldnotes, the building is "a good c. 1960 gable front brick building."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
churches; brickwork; gable-front houses; parking lots
